snippet: DogVacay.com, introduced March 1, compiles dog boarders across the United States and Canada who will house, feed and water your pup in their homes for a fee.
abstract: DogVacay.com, introduced March 1, compiles dog boarders across the United States and Canada who will house, feed and water your pup in their homes for a fee.

headline.main: Site Finds Home Hosts, Not Kennels, for Your Dog
